paragraphs: Senior Generative AI Engineer with expertise in building scalable, enterprise-grade AI solutions that drive real business impact.
Led the development of Agentic AI for MSRAG at Ascendion, reducing data processing time by 80%. Previously optimized LLMs at Collabera Digital.
Skilled in Generative AI, Databricks, and Solution Architecture. Passionate about solving real-world problems through AI innovation.
